positions.description: Main entrance of the Gang Territory, a key entry point for vehicles and characters.
Central gathering area, ideal for gang meetings and interactions.
Back alley, suitable for stealthy movements or ambush scenes.
Rooftop of a nearby building, offering a strategic vantage point for surveillance.
Garage area, commonly used for vehicle repairs or storage.

paths.description: A straight path from the main entrance to the central gathering area.
A curved path leading from the central gathering area to the back alley.
A staircase connecting the back alley to the rooftop.
A direct path from the central gathering area to the garage.
A narrow alley connecting the main entrance to the back alley.

obstacles.description: A set of trash bins partially blocking the curved path to the back alley.
A damaged staircase leading to the rooftop, requiring careful navigation.
An abandoned car blocking the path to the garage.
A temporary gang blockade restricting access to the back alley.
